summary: ENGINE HESTIATES.  ENGINE MOUNTS, LIFTER, TIMING CHAIN AND TIMING CHAIN COVER REPLACED.  VEHICLE COMPLETELY STALLED OUT.  DEALER FOUND LARGE HOLE IN ENGINE WHERE PISTON ROD WENT THROUGH ENGINE BLOCK.  TRANSMISSION MAKING CLUNK TYPE NOISE AND HAD TO BE REPAIRED.  RACK AND PINION ON STEERING HAD TO BE REPLACED.   *TT  *NLM
